experience.title: Student Placement Coordinator

experience.title: Summer School Exchange Student
experience.description: One of the 5 students to receive British Council Global Grant out of 150+ students for a 3 week Summer School at the University of Edinburgh Analysed methods to advocate food fortification and technology upgradation programmes to address challenges by the rural population of India

education.title: Delhi Public School - India
education.description: Activities and Societies: - Vice Head Girl in both the Primary and Senior wing
education.description_html: Activities and Societies: - Vice Head Girl in both the Primary and Senior wing

honors_and_awards.title: National Winner at PepsiCo Pre-MBA Case Competition
honors_and_awards.description: • Awarded National Winner out of 4000+ teams for planning an adoption and marketing strategy for Gatorade • Expanded marketing and sales channels, driving a significant increase in customer base from 5% to ~35%, enhancing outreach among the target audience

honors_and_awards.title: Second Runners Up at Maruti Suzuki XCELerate Case Competition
honors_and_awards.description: • Awarded Second Runners Up amongst 8000+ teams all over India for creating a go-to strategy for the promotion and sales of EVs in India • Created a business model to increase the sales of EVs by Maruti via strategic partnerships and achieve breakeven by the 6th year of operation

honors_and_awards.title: Next Generation Women Leaders - APAC at McKinsey and Company

honors_and_awards.title: Women's Possibilities Summit
honors_and_awards.description: • Amongst the top 50 women delegates chosen from all across India for the Goldman Sachs Women's Possibilities Summit Finance 2023

honors_and_awards.title: Second Runners Up at Hult Prize
honors_and_awards.description: • Awarded Second Runners Up amongst 50+ teams for the B2B EV Leasing Business Model for last mile delivery in India • Formulated a sustainable and scalable solution which can minimise rising carbon emissions by 7% and employ 2000+ people
